title: Late Night 5vs5 Tournament Draft - Starting Tonight at 9:30 EST
body:
http://evgtournaments.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/meltingevg.png






═══════════════ **Evolution Gaming Tournaments** ══════════════════

EVG Tournaments gives league of legends players the opportunity to experience competitive organized play in a casual low stress environment. Whether you are a high caliber challenger player looking for experience outside of solo queue, or a fresh level 30 player brand new to the league of legends scene, this is the place for you. Random team placements insure that all entrants have the opportunity to learn from each other, and have equal opportunity to win some RP. A strong, positive community with competitors of all skill and experience levels gives our players a great overall experience All you need is Teamspeak 3, a microphone, and a desire to win!

═══════════════ **Recruiting New Members Daily** ════════════════

Come join one of the oldest active community's hosting League of Legend action daily. if you are looking for new people to play with, or a duo q partner 
then come visit EVG Teamspeak server. Membership is open to anyone looking to have a good time. And if you are interested in joining our awesome staff, 
then you should be happy to know we have multiple staff positions you can apply for!

If you would like to apply for membership, please join our Teamspeak server. Or reply to this thread and I will add you in game and help you out ASAP.
> 
> **TeamSpeak Server: _TS.EVGTOURNAMENTS.COM_ or 192.223.29.160






═════════════ **Tournament Registration Information** ═══════════

> [CLICK HERE](http://www.evgtournaments.com) TO CHECK OUT OUR WEBSITE

> [CLICK HERE](http://evgtournaments.com/registration) TO REGISTER FOR ALL BRACKETS



═════════════ **Join Our Teamspeak** ═══════════

http://i.imgur.com/yBDMXDf.png

**TeamSpeak Server: _TS.EVGTOURNAMENTS.COM_ or 192.223.29.160

replies.body: Come and play! We have ARAM and 5v5 Tournaments tonight!
Come and play!  We have ARAM and 5v5 Tournaments tonight!
Come and play with us, join our teamspeak! We are starting at 9:30 EST
